hanzi-su-wiki:
隠

Значения

Прятать; прятаться; скрываться, невидимый

Мнемоника

Искажено. В спешке 急 прятаться у городской стены 阝, готовясь к штурму.

Варианты

隱, 隐
purpleculture_pinyin:
yǐn
Japanese variant of 隐
Японский вариант скрытого
rtega_mnemonic:
隠隠RS
隐隐		隱conceal, hide, cover
  • hide something quickly 𢚩/急 in a mound 阝
  • hide the fruits of your work 㥯 in a mound 阝
heisig_constituent: conceal, pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, hideaway, claw, vulture, broom, heart
heisig_story: Pinnacle . . . vulture . . . broom . . . heart. Compare the element sat the right to the kanji for calm (Frame 1230).
koohiiStory1: The wheat farmer´s heart is calm (#1147) about the eagle not stealing his crops because of the broom scarecrow. But he still conceals all his wheat at The Pinnacle in case anyone else trys to steal it.
koohiiStory2: Move the broom with a vulture perched on top, and you´ll find the concealed entrance to the heart of The Pinnacle.
kunYomi: かく.す、かく.し、かく.れる、かか.す、よ.る
jp_example_words:
隠居(いんきょ): retirement, retired person
隠す(かくす): to hide, to conceal
隠れる(かくれる): hide, be hidden, conceal oneself, disappear
jp_readingExamples: 隠す (かく.す), 隠れる (かく.れる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Behind a building, a cleat-wearing wolverine is holding his heart and trying to hide.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You know the phrase, "You can run, but you can't hide?" This wolverine can't run anymore so he's trying to hide (even though he knows it probably won't work).
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The wolverine looks up at the building he's trying to hide behind and see it's an inn (いん).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Lucky wolverine! Inns are good for hiding. The staff isn't supposed to give out his room number, and there are tons of different rooms for him to hide in.
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 尚 (ещё), ヨ, 阡, 心 (сердце)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you claw a yo from your heart (㥯) on the hill (⻖) as you hide

隠
Name meaning
Nothing.
yǐn, yìn
яп. вм. 隐
Radicals: 阝, ヨ, 心  (building, wolverine, heart, cleat)
Meaning Mnemonic
Behind a building, a cleat-wearing wolverine is holding his heart and trying to hide.
You know the phrase, "You can run, but you can't hide?" This wolverine can't run anymore so he's trying to hide (even though he knows it probably won't work).
Reading Mnemonic
The wolverine looks up at the building he's trying to hide behind and see it's an inn (いん).
Lucky wolverine! Inns are good for hiding. The staff isn't supposed to give out his room number, and there are tons of different rooms for him to hide in.
